statements: SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, disease FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, location FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE date_reported = '2022-01-15';
SELECT patient_id, gender, disease FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE disease LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY date_reported ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks ORDER BY date_reported DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, location FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE disease = 'Flu';
SELECT patient_id, gender, date_reported FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY date_reported ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT disease FROM DiseaseOutbreaks;
SELECT patient_name, age, location, date_reported FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE gender = 'Male' AND location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT patient_id, disease, admission_date FROM Patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT patient_name, doctor_id, medication FROM Patients JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, disease FROM Patients WHERE disease LIKE '%diabetes%' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT * FROM MedicalRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'Heart Disease' AND medication = 'Aspirin'
SELECT Patients.patient_name, MedicalRecords.diagnosis FROM Patients INNER JOIN MedicalRecords ON Patients.patient_id = MedicalRecords.patient_id
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, location FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE location='New York';
SELECT outbreak_id, location, outbreak_type FROM Outbreaks ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN DiseaseHistory ON Patients.patient_id = DiseaseHistory.patient_id WHERE DiseaseHistory.disease_name = 'COVID-19';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Patients UNION SELECT location FROM Outbreaks;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM Patients;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT symptoms, description FROM Diseases WHERE name = 'Influenza';
SELECT location, start_date FROM Outbreaks ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, recorded_date, temperature FROM PatientData WHERE temperature > 100.0 ORDER BY recorded_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male' AND location='New York'
SELECT disease_id, name, description, symptoms FROM Diseases WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(symptoms) > 50

SELECT Patients.name, Diseases.name FROM Patients JOIN PatientData ON Patients.patient_id = PatientData.patient_id JOIN Diseases ON PatientData.disease_id = Diseases.disease_id WHERE Patients.age < 30
SELECT Patients.name, Outbreaks.location, Outbreaks.start_date, Outbreaks.end_date FROM Patients, Outbreaks WHERE Patients.location = Outbreaks.location AND Patients.age BETWEEN 40 AND 60
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, city FROM Patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, age, city FROM Patients WHERE city='New York' AND diagnosis='COVID-19';
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_type='Surgery' ORDER BY treatment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, city FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE treatment_type = 'Surgery';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, doctor_name, hospital_name FROM Patients JOIN Doctors ON Patients.patient_id = Doctors.doctor_id JOIN Hospitals ON Doctors.hospital_id = Hospitals.hospital_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM Patients WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT disease_name, symptoms FROM Diseases WHERE outbreak_status = TRUE ORDER BY symptoms ASC;
